title: Default Remaster Cleanup Rules
description: Comprehensive set of rewrite rules to remove remaster information from track names and album names, based on analysis of 600+ real Last.fm tracks and albums.

rules.name: Remove Year Digital Remaster
examples: The Big Ship - 2004 Digital Remaster → The Big Ship
Bitter Sweet Symphony - 2004 Digital Remaster → Bitter Sweet Symphony

rules.name: Remove Year Remaster
examples: Blitzkrieg Bop - 2016 Remaster → Blitzkrieg Bop

rules.name: Remove Remastered Year
examples: He's So Fine - Remastered 2000 → He's So Fine
Express Yourself - Remastered 2000 → Express Yourself

rules.name: Remove Year Remastered Version
examples: Do Wah Diddy Diddy - 2007 Remastered Version → Do Wah Diddy Diddy
The Air That I Breathe - 2008 Remastered Version → The Air That I Breathe

rules.name: Remove Remastered Version
examples: Mighty Tight Woman - Remastered Version → Mighty Tight Woman
Big Road - Remastered Version → Big Road

rules.name: Remove Plain Remastered
examples: Such Great Heights - Remastered → Such Great Heights
Virtual Insanity - Remastered → Virtual Insanity

rules.name: Remove Digitally Remastered
examples: Skating In Central Park - Digitally Remastered → Skating In Central Park
Steps-What Was - Digitally Remastered → Steps-What Was

rules.name: Remove Remastered LP Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - 2007 Remastered LP Version' or 'Song - Remastered LP Version'
examples: Handle With Care - 2007 Remastered LP Version → Handle With Care
They Reminisce Over You - Remastered LP Version → They Reminisce Over You

rules.name: Remove Digital Remaster Variations
examples: Express Yourself - Digital Remaster 00 → Express Yourself

rules.name: Remove Rudy Van Gelder Remaster
rules.description: Removes patterns with Rudy Van Gelder remaster information
examples: Bags' Groove - Rudy Van Gelder 2001 - Remaster → Bags' Groove
Inner Urge - Rudy Van Gelder Edition;2003 Digital Remaster → Inner Urge

rules.name: Remove Remastered Album Version
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song - Remastered Album Version'
examples: Track Name - Remastered Album Version → Track Name

rules.name: Remove Remastered Edition
examples: Dreams - 2004 Remastered Edition → Dreams
The Chain - 2004 Remastered Edition → The Chain

rules.name: Remove Year - Remaster Format
examples: The Beach Boys - Wouldn't it Be Nice - 1999 - Remaster → Wouldn't it Be Nice
Billy Idol - Eyes Without A Face - 1999 - Remaster → Eyes Without A Face

rules.name: Remove Parenthetical Remastered
examples: Orion (Remastered) → Orion
Enter Sandman (Remastered) → Enter Sandman

rules.name: Remove Parenthetical Year Remaster
examples: Lazy Sunday (Mono Version) (2018 Remaster) → Lazy Sunday (Mono Version)
My Sweet Lord (2000) (2014 Remaster) → My Sweet Lord (2000)

rules.name: Remove Parenthetical Re-Recorded
examples: Stand By Me (Re-Recorded / Remastered) → Stand By Me
Build Me Up Buttercup (Re-Recorded) → Build Me Up Buttercup

rules.name: Remove Bracketed Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Song [Remastered Version]' or 'Song [2023 Remaster]'
examples: Mighty Tight Woman [Remastered Version] → Mighty Tight Woman
Search and Destroy [2023 Remaster] → Search and Destroy

rules.name: Remove 24-Bit Digitally Remastered
examples: White Wedding - Parts 1 And 2 - 24-Bit Digitally Remastered 01 → White Wedding - Parts 1 And 2
Mack The Knife - 24-Bit Digitally Remastered → Mack The Knife

rules.name: Remove Complex Punctuation Patterns
rules.description: Removes patterns with semicolons and complex formatting
examples: I Ain't Tha 1 - Edited;2000 Digital Remaster → I Ain't Tha 1
Un Poco Loco - 1998 Digital Remaster;The Rudy Van Gelder Edition → Un Poco Loco

rules.name: Remove Complex Slash Patterns
rules.description: Removes patterns with slashes like 'Song - Pt. 1 / Remastered/2019'
examples: Precious Lord - Pt. 1 / Remastered/2019 → Precious Lord
White Wedding - Pt. 1 / Remastered 2002 → White Wedding

rules.name: Remove Parenthetical Year Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (2014 Remastered)' or 'Album (2018 Remaster Version)'
examples: All Things Must Pass (2014 Remastered) → All Things Must Pass
Small Faces (2018 Remaster) → Small Faces

rules.name: Remove Deluxe Remastered Edition
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Deluxe Remastered Edition)' or 'Album (Deluxe Edition Remastered)'
examples: Idlewild South (Deluxe Edition Remastered) → Idlewild South
Ready To Die (The Remaster) → Ready To Die

rules.name: Remove Expanded & Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Expanded & Remastered Original Album Mix)'
examples: Red (Expanded & Remastered Original Album Mix) → Red
Larks' Tongues In Aspic (Expanded & Remastered Original Album Mix) → Larks' Tongues In Aspic

rules.name: Remove Remaster Edition Text
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (Remaster)' or 'Album (2006 Remastered Version)'
examples: Paranoid (Remaster) → Paranoid
Pink Flag (2006 Remastered Version) → Pink Flag

rules.name: Remove Bracketed Remaster Info
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album [RVG Remaster]' or 'Album [Original Jazz Classics Remasters]'
examples: We Three [RVG Remaster] → We Three
Waltz For Debby [Original Jazz Classics Remasters] → Waltz For Debby

rules.name: Remove HD Digital Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album - HD Digital Remastered 2009'
examples: Time Out - HD Digital Remastered 2009 → Time Out

rules.name: Remove Anniversary Remaster Editions
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (40th Anniversary Deluxe Edition; 2016 Remaster)'
examples: Ramones (40th Anniversary Deluxe Edition; 2016 Remaster) → Ramones

rules.name: Remove CTI Anniversary Remastered
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (CTI Records 40th Anniversary Edition - Original recording remastered)'
examples: Red Clay (CTI Records 40th Anniversary Edition - Original recording remastered) → Red Clay

rules.name: Remove Remastered Bonus Version
examples: Brushfire Fairytales [Remastered (Bonus Version)] → Brushfire Fairytales

rules.name: Remove OJC Remaster
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (OJC Remaster)' for Original Jazz Classics releases
examples: Jazz Impressions Of Black Orpheus (OJC Remaster) → Jazz Impressions Of Black Orpheus

rules.name: Remove Gould Remaster Reference
rules.description: Removes patterns like 'Album (1981 Gould Remaster)' for classical music
examples: Bach: The Goldberg Variations, BWV 988 (1981 Gould Remaster) → Bach: The Goldberg Variations, BWV 988

rules.name: Remove Anniversary Remaster Suffix
examples: Oh, Inverted World (20th Anniversary Remaster) → Oh, Inverted World

rules.name: Remove Digitally Remastered Parenthetical
examples: Elvis Restored (Digitally Remastered) → Elvis Restored

rules.name: Remove Deluxe Edition (MB-confirmed)
rules.description: Removes '(Deluxe Edition)' from album names only when MusicBrainz confirms the track exists on the original non-deluxe release
examples: XO (Deluxe Edition) â†’ XO

rules.name: Remove Remastered Original Album Mix
examples: Daydream Nation (Remastered Original Album) → Daydream Nation
